price: "Rãyuwa ba ta zama ba fãce rãyuwarmu ta dũniya, munã mutuwa kuma munã rãyuwa,* kuma ba mu zama waɗanda ake tãyarwa ba."
arabic: إِنۡ هِيَ إِلَّا حَيَاتُنَا ٱلدُّنۡيَا نَمُوتُ وَنَحۡيَا وَمَا نَحۡنُ بِمَبۡعُوثِينَ
footnotes: * Munã mutuwa kuma munã rãyuwa da haihuwar ɗiya da 'yã'ya. A bãyan wannan bãbu wata rãyuwa ta wata Lãhira,.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: in hiya illā ḥayātunā al-dun'yā namūtu wanaḥyā wamā naḥnu bimabʿūthīna
